text: Moshe Arens terminal is a temporary central station, designed to replace the Petah Tiqwa CBS until the opening of the new central station in Petah Tiqwa. The station is located close to Avshalom Gissin, Bar Kochba, and mivtza kadesh streets. The station was established on May 31, 2019. == Station building == The station has 8 platforms. There is a station next to the terminal on Avshalom Gissin Street. == Bus lines at the station == Reading signs *‚ôø - an accessible city bus *üîÑ ‚Äì circular line *‚¨ÖÔ∏è - one-way line line Route 17 'Moshe Arens Terminal -
